00021 namespace boost {
00022 namespace xint {
00023 
00036 int compare(const integer &b1, const integer &b2, bool ignoresign) {
00037     if (!ignoresign) {
00038         int sign1=b1.sign(), sign2=b2.sign();
00039         if (sign1==0 && sign2==0) return 0;
00040         if (sign1==0) return -sign2;
00041         if (sign2==0) return sign1;
00042 
00043         if (sign1 != sign2) return sign1;
00044         if (sign1 < 0) return compare(-b2, -b1, ignoresign);
00045     }
00046 
00047     if (b1._get_length() != b2._get_length()) {
00048         return ((b1._get_length() < b2._get_length()) ? -1 : 1);
00049     } else {
00050         size_t len=b1._get_length();
00051         const detail::digit_t *b1d=b1._get_digits(), *b1i=b1d+len;
00052         const detail::digit_t *b2d=b2._get_digits(), *b2i=b2d+len;
00053         while (b1i > b1d)
00054             if (*(--b1i) != *(--b2i))
00055                 return ((*b1i < *b2i) ? -1 : 1);
00056     }
00057 
00058     return 0;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool operator!(const integer &num1) { return num1.sign()==0; }
00062 bool operator==(const integer &num1, const integer &num2) {
00063     return compare(num1, num2)==0; }
00064 bool operator!=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00065     return compare(num1, num2)!=0; }
00066 bool operator<(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00067     return compare(num1, num2)<0; }
00068 bool operator>(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00069     return compare(num1, num2)>0; }
00070 bool operator<=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00071     return compare(num1, num2)<=0; }
00072 bool operator>=(const integer& num1, const integer& num2) {
00073     return compare(num1, num2)>=0; }
00074
